dkeep.logic

Class Ogre

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Character
      • dkeep.logic.Ogre
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameElement

    public class Ogre
extends Character

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ogre(char charc)
      Constructs an ogre represented by the given char Sets stunned to false (ogre's not stunned) Sets turnsLeft to 2 (if the ogre gets stunned, he will remain stunned for two turns)
      Ogre(int line, int column, char charc)
      Constructs an ogre in the given position, represented by the given char Sets stunned to false (ogre's not stunned) Sets turnsLeft to 2 (if the ogre gets stunned, he will remain stunned for two turns)
